price: Dájúdájú ó wá láti ọ̀dọ̀ (Ànábì) Sulaemọ̄n. Dájúdájú ó (sọ pé) “Ní orúkọ Allāhu, Àjọkẹ́-ayé, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
